name: Contraband Police
description:
How much contraband, you think can be smuggled in one truck on a third-world country border?
As a contraband police inspector, do Your best to find out!
Validate documentsCheck driver's license, transport checklist and other to find any discordance with the actual state.
Allow or deny passing the border.
Examine vehicle for technical faultsBe alert for any deviations from the norm like spilled oil, broken lights or bald tires.
Write a ticket suitable for the failures found.
You are responsible for allowing faulty cars pass the border.
Discover contrabandSearch for smuggled alkohol, drugs, weapons etc. hidden inside car parts or cargo.
Decide whether to report found contraband or take a bribe and let the smuggler through.
Upgrade your postGather police respect for your great work or loose for mistakes.
Spend your points on post upgrades like new inspection tools, barriers, K-9 dog and many more.
Complete different tasks each day New day can bring some unexpected restrictions for vehicles like max emission of exhaust gases,
total weight or banned cargo.
